constraints.name: non_negative_sum
constraints.description: 所有元素的总和非负（即，添加的元素总和大于等于移除的元素总和）
constraints.formal: sum(X_i for X_i > 0) >= sum(-X_i for X_i < 0)

constraints.name: valid_removal
constraints.description: 每次移除操作必须是有效的，即移除的元素在当前集合中存在
constraints.formal: For each X_i < 0, there exists a positive X_j = -X_i in the current set
